Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Chicago/Wabash
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses rrtd WB via Chicago, Michigan, Ontario, State and Chicago;Chicago, Sate, Ohio, Michigan and Chicago due to police activity near Chicago/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Chicago/Wabash.

  • Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, Michigan, Ontario, State and Chicago, then resume their normal route.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, Sate, Ohio, Michigan and Chicago, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
